attributes.action: getting value for money from prisoners by working for us.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why should we pay to keep prisoners locked up in jail all the time when a lot of them are low category and able bodied. could they not be taken outside and used to clean ditches and cut hedges which are overgrown . at least this way we would be seeing something for our hard earned money as tax payers and this may even help to stop some of the flash flooding.
